mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modiDate = now() where writer = #{writer} and bno = #{bno}
update board set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board where writer = #{writer} and bno = #{bno}
